t: WPP and Omnicom bag Amazon's media account after marathon global review
s: September 4, 2024 - It was described as the Global Media Pitch of the Decade. Amazon's mammoth global media planning and buying account went up for review in late 2023 and finally the winners have emerged. WPP and Omnicom Media Group (OMG) have bagged the media business, edging out the incumbent - IPG's Initiative.
